meanings.definition: The background or setting of a scene or event.
meanings.sent1: The colorful sunset served as a beautiful backdrop for the wedding photos.
meanings.sent2: The city skyline made a stunning backdrop for the outdoor concert.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel added a playful touch to the peaceful backdrop of the park.
meanings.sent4: The towering mountains created a majestic backdrop for the small village below.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering lake provided a serene backdrop for the family picnic.

meanings.definition: A large piece of cloth with a painted scene used as a background in a theater or studio.
meanings.sent1: The actors stood in front of the colorful backdrop during the play.
meanings.sent2: The photographer set up a professional backdrop for the portrait session.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to climb the backdrop during the theater performance.
meanings.sent4: The intricate backdrop transformed the stage into a magical forest.
meanings.sent5: The detailed backdrop depicted a bustling city street for the film scene.

meanings.sent1: She wanted to backdrop the presentation with soothing music.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to backdrop the painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: He tried to backdrop his story with humorous anecdotes.
meanings.sent4: The designer chose to backdrop the fashion show with elegant decor.
meanings.sent5: They planned to backdrop the event with a stunning light display.
